segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to buy some milk powder . What would you recommend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have many kinds of different purpose . I wonder whom you are buying for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My son . He is two years old .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see , sir . This one is very good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You may rest assured . It sells well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have a look at the introduction ?
segments.speaker: S2
